# classify

Description of your project.

# Activate Virtual Environment
```
source .venv/bin/activate
```

## Installation

```
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

## Usage

```
python3 -m classify.main
```

## Running Tests

```
python3 -m unittest discover tests
```
